name: Brisk Banter
description:
Brisk Banter is a fast paced RPG with an emphasis on dialogue to help players with social anxiety.  Download it now to start becoming a social stud!

With this game, we wanted to make something that was extremely fun, but also had the alternative value of helping those who feel uncomfortable when talking to others. Through dialogue that helps reinforce good habits for those with anxiety, along with a bit of humor and other fun mechanics, we know we have accomplished our goal. 

Go through multiple worlds, talk to over 30 unique npcs, and have exciting boss battles, all while being under the pressure of the clock. Can you navigate your way through these intense conversations?
